homepage.on_number_of_server: Bounsbot, the Discord bot approved by over {{number}} servers

multimedia.name: Multimedia
multimedia.description1: Play songs on demand or listen to a radio station all day without ever having to stop.
multimedia.description2: The party won't stop even when you leave, as Bouns'bot stays in your channel 24/7!

game.name: Games
game.description1: Play a variety of mini-games! You can play over 15 mini-games alone or against your friends.
game.description2: Distinguish yourself with the built-in Bouns'bot ranking and test your general knowledge with our quiz.

logs.name: Logs
logs.description1: What's that? You didn't know Wumpus turned on his camera!
logs.description2: With Bouns'bot, you have access to all the logs available on Discord; simply activate what you need.

ticket.name: Tickets
ticket.description: Bouns’bot allows you to create private support channels, which we call tickets, between your team and those seeking assistance.

engagement.name: Engagement
engagement.description: Reward your members with XP points and keep track of the most active members on your custom leaderboard.

brand.slogan: Create a Discord server that reflects your identity

levels.no_guild_leaderboard: I don't think there's any information for this guild...

404_page.title: WRONG TURN?
404_page.text: You seem lost, stranger. If you want to add Bouns'Bot, the button below might help you.

loader.TIPS_2: Did you know that kittens are adorable little furballs? 😻
loader.TIPS_3: A little secret: penguins are excellent dancers! 🐧💃
loader.TIPS_4: Patience is a virtue, even during page loading. 🧘‍♂️
loader.TIPS_5: Need a break? Why not do a little robot dance? 🤖💃
loader.TIPS_6: Astronomy is fascinating. Every star is a world of its own. ✨🪐
loader.TIPS_7: Try to guess how many clouds pass by during the loading. ☁️☁️☁️
loader.TIPS_8: Did you know that elephants have an excellent memory? 🐘🧠
loader.TIPS_10: Nature is full of beauty. Take a moment to appreciate it. 🌿🌻
loader.TIPS_11: Curiosity is the best fuel for knowledge. 💡📚
loader.TIPS_12: A smile is the universal language of friendship. 😄🤝
loader.TIPS_13: Dreams are like stars: you can't always touch them, but you can follow them. 🌟🌠
loader.TIPS_14: Here's a joke while you wait: Why do divers always dive backward and never forward? Because otherwise, they fall into the boat! 🤣🚢
loader.TIPS_15: Did you know that penguins have secret meetings every Thursday night? Shhh, it's a secret! 🐧🤫
loader.TIPS_16: Loading may take a little time, but remember: great things take time. 🚀🌟
loader.TIPS_17: Why does JavaScript always look tired? Because it always needs caffeine (addEventListener 'coffee')! ☕😄
loader.TIPS_18: Perseverance is the key to success. Keep waiting; you're almost there! 🌈💪
loader.TIPS_19: Your patience is admirable. Take this break to take a deep breath and smile. 😊🌬️
loader.TIPS_20: Did you know that pandas are the kings of napping? 🐼💤
loader.TIPS_21: There are hidden treasures in every moment of waiting. Keep searching! 💎🔍
loader.TIPS_22: Remember that even the tallest buildings started with foundations. Your page is becoming great! 🏗️📈
loader.TIPS_23: Loading is an opportunity to take a break, breathe deeply, and remember how amazing you are. 🌟🌿
loader.TIPS_24: Success begins with a single step. Your loading is one of them! 🚶‍♂️🌟
loader.TIPS_25: Never lose hope, even while waiting. Every moment is an opportunity. 🌈💫
loader.TIPS_26: You are stronger than you think. Keep the faith while waiting. 💪🌟
loader.TIPS_27: Perseverance is the key to success. Keep waiting; your moment will come. 🗝️🌟
loader.TIPS_28: Did you know that rainbows only come after the rain? Your loading is the rain before the rainbow. 🌦️🌈
loader.TIPS_29: Dreams come true one step at a time. Your page is one step closer to making your dream a reality. 🚀💭
loader.TIPS_30: Every loading is an opportunity to grow. Keep growing, even during the wait. 🌱🌟
loader.TIPS_31: Patience is a virtue. You're becoming more patient with every passing second. ⏳😇
loader.TIPS_32: Remember that you've gone through tough times before, and you've come out stronger. 🦸‍♂️💪
loader.TIPS_33: Life is a journey, and even the loading is part of the journey. Enjoy it! 🌍🌟
